comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/70251312@N00] Good call, Wystan! This would appear to be Florence Raynor, a witness in the Carman Case. I also suspect this and the other adjacent Bain photos of Burnell and Dr. Runcie were taken at the Old Nassau County Courthouse (then the relatively "new" Nassau County Courthouse, built about 13 years earlier). query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=F10913FE3F5412738... CLUE TO GUNMAN IN BAILEY MURDER Address in "Gopher" Gang Section Said to Have Been on Paper Mrs. Carman Showed. July 10, 1914 New York Times
